pin_intent.target_audience: Home Decor Enthusiasts, New Homeowners, Design-conscious individuals, Renters seeking elevated style
pin_intent.search_intent: Inspirational, Informational, Transactional (indirectly, by inspiring purchases)

visual_concept.scene_description: A meticulously styled, serene living room corner bathed in soft natural light, showcasing a blend of luxurious textures and clean lines. The focus is on a curated vignette that feels inviting and aspirational.
visual_concept.subject_focus: A plush, oversized cream-colored boucle armchair or sofa section, adorned with a chunky knit throw blanket in a complementary neutral tone. Adjacent is a minimalist fluted natural wood side table holding a single, elegant ceramic vase with dried pampas grass or delicate preserved eucalyptus.
visual_concept.background_style: Soft, blurred background of a warm off-white or light greige wall, possibly with a subtle shadow play from a nearby window. Minimal architectural details.
visual_concept.lighting_style: Soft, diffused natural light from a large window, creating gentle highlights and deep, soft shadows that enhance textures and create a calming ambiance. Golden hour glow.
visual_concept.camera_angle: Eye-level medium shot, slightly angled to capture depth and the inviting nature of the vignette, emphasizing the textures and overall mood.

image_generation_prompt.prompt: A high-end, editorial photograph of a cozy neutral living room corner. Focus on a luxurious cream-colored boucle armchair with a beige chunky knit throw draped over it. Next to the armchair, a minimalist fluted natural light wood side table holds a single elegant matte ceramic vase with delicate dried pampas grass. Soft, diffused golden hour natural light streams in from a large window, casting gentle, elongated shadows and highlighting the rich textures. The walls are a warm off-white or light greige. The aesthetic is serene, sophisticated, and inviting. Ultra-realistic, professional photography, shallow depth of field, perfect composition, warm tones, Pinterest aesthetic.
image_generation_prompt.negative_prompt: Clutter, harsh shadows, artificial lighting, bright colors, messy, cheap materials, synthetic textures, busy patterns, low quality, distorted, bad perspective, out of focus foreground.

text_overlay.headline: COZY NEUTRAL HOME
text_overlay.supporting_text: Elevate Your Space with Timeless Style
text_overlay.font_style: Bold Elegant Serif (for headline) + Clean Modern Sans-Serif (for supporting text)
text_overlay.placement: Upper third of the image, with ample padding

seo_metadata.pin_title: Cozy Neutral Home Decor Ideas | Timeless Living Room & Bedroom Style
seo_metadata.pin_description: Discover stunning cozy neutral home decor ideas to create a serene and inviting space. Learn how to master warm whites, beige tones, and natural textures for a high-end, timeless living room or bedroom. Get inspired by minimalist and Scandinavian design principles. Perfect for modern homes and sophisticated interiors. #NeutralHomeDecor #CozyHome #MinimalistDecor #ScandinavianStyle #HomeInspiration
